lines.text: What happened? What's wrong?
I'm dyin' and you start a quiz program!
Where's your gun?
Gun? Oh! The landlady's baby was cryin', so I gave it to the baby to play with.

[whispering]
It's that crook and he's wearin' a fur coat! Come on!
[the Stooges come up and Moe gets the gorilla's attention by kicking him in the butt. The Stooges all point their guns at the gorilla]
Stick 'em up, Ape Man! We gotcha covered!
[the gorilla destroys the Stooges' guns]
Hey, fellas! Look! No human is strong enough to bend a gun barrel like that!
It's real! A real chimmanypanzee!
That's no chimp, ya chump! That's a gorilla!
Next time you handle a gun, shoot yourself in the head.
I'll make a note of it. How do you spell head?
B-O-N-E. head!
[he whacks him in the head with a gun and the gun bends]
That ox can't call me a monkey!
Shut up you baboon!
[Curly sticks his tongue at Moe while Moe puts a clothespin on his tongue]
I don't wanna be dead. There's no future in it!
Hey, you only fell 14 feet! Why are ya getting sore?

[Pretending to be surprised]
Is that all it was?
Yeah!
What are you, cowards? I'll lead the way. Go ahead.
[Moe pushes Larry and Curly ahead of him]
